skillTree.name: Master of the Forge
skillTree.description: There are none more adept at metal-shaping than those who command the runes.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

skillTree.name: Damping
skillTree.description: The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"

skillTree.name: Rune of Hearth & Home
skillTree.description: Invoking the Rune of Hearth & Home stirs a Dwarf's pride in his Hold, Clan and Ancestors.

skillTree.name: Wardbreaker
skillTree.description: Dawi Rune Magic is potent, and damned hard to defend against!

skillTree.name: Strike the Runes
skillTree.description: A Runesmith may "strike the runes" - an analogy for keeping them "hot", refusing to let them cool.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic

skillTree.name: Master Rune of Spite
skillTree.description: The power of this rune undermines the armour worn by the enemies of the Dawi.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Rune of Resistance
skillTree.description: This rune provides the Runesmith with resistance to flame.

skillTree.name: Rune of Sanctuary
skillTree.description: Look at the wee wizards cower in their boots.

skillTree.name: Rune of Spellbreaking
skillTree.description: Casting spells in the presence of a Runesmith skilled enough to have mastered the use of this rune is risky to say the least.

skillTree.name: Rune of Fate
skillTree.description: They say he brings misfortune to those who oppose the throng...

skillTree.name: Old-fashioned Tinkering
skillTree.description: Ensuring that your weapon is always in tip-top shape isn’t an easy job. This old-timer knows a couple of handy tricks that will make it simpler, and he’s always willing to share.

skillTree.name: Venerated
skillTree.description: Even a dwarf must sometimes admit when they're in the presence of somebody they should be happy to learn from.

skillTree.name: Rune of Valaya
skillTree.description: Valaya's rune provides the wearer with vigour, and protects all Dawi from corruption.

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

skillTree.name: Harden Armour
skillTree.description: Blending magic and metalwork, the Runesmith hones armour with greater solidity than items wrought by any other mortal race in the world.

effects.description: Harden Armour action: armour is increased by an additional 3
Harden Armour action: armour is increased by an additional 5

skillTree.name: Sharpen Weapons
skillTree.description: Perhaps by some gift of Grungni, when a Runesmith feels the rage of battle his throng’s weapons glow with the heat of the forgefires.

effects.description: Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 3%
Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Untainted is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Grimnir
skillTree.description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Grungni
skillTree.description: This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Valaya
skillTree.description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Gazul
skillTree.description: Even in the time of the Ancestor Gods, Gazul pondered long on the mortality of his race.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Morgrim
skillTree.description: Morgrim was the first Dwarf Engineer. He developed and taught his clans the techniques of crafting engines of war and other devices.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Smednir
skillTree.description: Smednir is a Dwarf deity of some importance, because of his patronage of metalworking and the refining of ore.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Thungni
skillTree.description: The younger son of Grungni and Valaya, Thungni is the god of Runic magic and runesmithing.

skillTree.name: Grobi Slayer
skillTree.description: Greenskins don't deserve to live longer than a fly.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.name: Thaggoraki Slayer
skillTree.description: Skaven will die for our brothers lost in the deep tunnels!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Skaven
